fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Those guys were killing weak vulnerable people. Each full moon, attack a random non-Were player without defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Hunting Moon Enhancement: **Those Guys Were Killing Powerful Invincible People** â€” Your ability instead deals an Overkill attack to a random non-Were player with the highest defense that it can kill.
